title: Townhouse for Rent - 4BR and 3 Baths - Move-in June
description:
Looking for a family or group of people who want to move into a NEW and MODERN house in Northern Liberties near the corner of 6th and Fairmount Ave in this awesome neighborhood.
The house size is huge - 2500sqft - 4 Spacious Bedrooms, 3 Full Bathrooms, Roof Top Deck, Finished Basement, 1 under carriage gated parking spot, and the best LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.  Rent would be $4,000 and renters pay ALL their own utilities. Move-in by June 1st, 2022.
The House has ALL NEW appliances, amenities, huge rooftop deck, finished basement, and 1 under carriage gated parking spot. What else could you ask for?!
Master Bedroom and Master Bath on 3rd Floor, 2 Bedrooms and Bathroom on 2nd Floor, 1 Bedroom and 1 Bathroom in Basement.
Location:
- NEW AMAZON SUPERMARKET being built 200ft to the left of the house.
- NEW Wawa and Independence Mall 0.8 of mile down the street.
- Seconds away to entrance of Schuylkill Expressway, Vine St Expressway, and, I-95.
- FREE street parking everywhere.
- Yards Brewery and Target Superstore are across the street.
- Indigo Bike stand is right out the front door.
- 3 blocks away from Spring Garden Subway Station (Frankford Line/L)
- Excellent Location
Looking for good tenants who will take care of the house and the house will take care of you. Please provide me with a description of yourself. Looking for minimum 1 yr lease.
I'll try to post all the pics but I may have to many. Craigslist restricts to many picture uploads.
Any questions/inquiries, text/call me  show contact info
or email me directly at Marshall.SegelATyahoo.com
If you’re reading this ad, the property is available!

title: This modern two-bedroom, two-bath condo
description:
Saint James Court offers a serene park-like setting in the heart of Society Hill. This modern two-bedroom, two-bath condo facing the interior courtyard features a dramatic Living Room with soaring ceilings and sliding glass doors opening out to a private patio garden. Having been completely renovated from its original construction you'll enjoy entertaining with a newer kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, offering a gas range, microwave oven, and refrigerator with ice and water feature on the door, granite countertops, and a spacious pantry closet. The updated bathrooms and a mezzanine office overlooking the Saint James Court, featuring a laundry closet with a full-size stackable washer and dryer and utility sink are conveniently located off the master suite. Enjoy generous closet spaces and beautiful wood floors throughout. You'll never have to walk far to enjoy historic sites, world-class museums, top-ranked restaurants, convenient supermarkets, and sports clubs. GARAGE PARKING is guaranteed at Independence Place for an additional monthly cost. This property is pet-friendly too!

title: Country Living at its Best ! Your Pets & Horses are welcome

Tired of Searching? Having trouble finding a great place? We’ve spent 30 years helping customers winnow through the chaff in order to find the home of their dreams.
Whether you want to enjoy the perks of living in a city, close to bus lines, shopping, and major convenience, or yearn for quiet, secluded country life on acres of land, away from through traffic, we can help.
Looking for a unique, brag-able property? Cottages, carriage houses, single-family homes, townhouses, duplex rentals, house/apartments, bungalows, and more come into our hands all of the time.
Or plan on taking the next step, starting out to buy? That's also something we deal with, a lease to purchase, rent to own type situation, putting money down every month towards purchasing the rental home you live in.
Serving all of Montgomery County, and the surrounding areas, with homes and apartments in all parts of the county, from Conshohocken to Greenville to Pottstown, and everything in between
So give us a call today. We’re more than happy to help take the stress away, and help you focus on what’s really important. Look only at rentals that you know will match exactly what you need in your next home.

title: This gorgeous 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom apartment
description:
Available early June: Welcome to 530 S 15th St #3! This gorgeous 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom apartment is a large and sunny bi-level unit on the 3rd & 4th floors of a great building. The common area is bright from the lovely bay windows, and a ceiling fan will keep you comfortable year-round. There is room for separate living room / dining room set ups, and the space flows back nicely into the kitchen. Kitchen features include white cabinetry above & below for storage, breakfast bar, ample prep space, refrigerator, electric strove, microwave, dishwasher and trash compactor. Head into your first bathroom offering tile flooring, lighted vanity, window, and a shower / tub combo with frosted sliding glass doors. The first bedroom is also on this level, with wall-to-wall carpeting, sliding closet doors that have full sized mirrors and 2 windows for great natural sunlight. Continue upstairs to a large open area which would work well as a den or office space. From here you can access your private roofdeck – perfect for those warmer months! This incredible roofdeck has a spiral staircase that leads you to the roof with breathtaking views of the city. Also on this level are the second bedroom and full bathroom. The bedroom is sizable with double sliding closet doors and great natural light. Your second bathroom offers a window, lighted vanity, and shower / tub combo. Schedule your tour today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood on the corner of 15th Street& South Street, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of brand new restaurants, cafes and bars, and shopping options. You’ll be one block away from ample public transportation options along Broad Street. Walkable to iconic neighborhood hotspots including Bob and Barbara’s Lounge, PHS Pop Up Garden, Tio Flores, Founding Fathers Sports Bar, Miles Table, Giorgio on Pine, Dirty Franks, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner’s approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants responsible for: Upfront payments due: $125 per 12 months for PECO; $395 per 12 months for water; Tenant obtains PECO account for in-unit power usage.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

-24/7 emergency maintenance service

-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-This is a cat friendly community

title: Extra Large Fox Chase Twin with a garage and pool !!
description:
Extra Large Fox Chase Twin with a garage and pool !! 3 Bedrooms, 2 Full baths. High ceilings and large rooms define this home. The foyer entrance is filled with sunlight from the large front windows which overlook the park across the way. The hardwood floors give this space a warm and welcoming entrance. The living room is large and features new wall to wall carpet covering hardwood flooring.
